actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to provide for the acquisition, construction, renovation, and improvement of child care facilities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Child Care Facilities Financing Act of 2009

summary.text: Child Care Facilities Financing Act of 2009 - Authorizes the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award competitive grants to eligible entities to deposit into child care capital funds for technical and financial assistance to eligible child care providers to pay the costs of acquisition, construction, renovation, or improvement of child care facilities or equipment, or for technical assistance to such providers to help them undertake facilities improvement and expansion.

titles.title: Child Care Facilities Financing Act of 2009
A bill to provide for the acquisition, construction, renovation, and improvement of child care facilities, and for other purposes.
